DOC.brief_summary: Optiscope (Clarus Medical, Minneapolis, MN, USA) is a semi-rigid fiberscope for endotracheal intubation. This study will investigate learning curve of Optiscope by anesthesia providers.
DOC.brief_title: Learning Curve of Optiscope by Anesthesia Providers
DOC.criteria: Patient who is scheduled general anesthesia for elective surgery patient who is anticipated difficult airway patient who is needed rapid sequence induction Cervical injury
